subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|alt=𣍐}}

Contraction of {{zh-l|無會|bô-ē}}.

Used as a replacement character for {{zh-l|𣍐|tr=-}}. Use of {{lang|zh|袂}} is [http://twblg.dict.edu.tw/holodict_new/iongji/pdf/annesia376pdf.pdf recommended] by Taiwan's Ministry of Education.

Compare with {{cog|zhx-teo|𠁞}}.

* {{sense|reply to thanks}} {{zh-l|毋免客氣}}, {{zh-l|免客氣}}
